mapper.update: update venue_coach set cv_status = 1 where cv_id = #{cv_id}
update venue_coach set cv_status = 2 where cv_id = #{cv_id}
mapper.insert: insert into recruitment values (default ,#{recruit.venue_id},(SELECT dict_id FROM base_dict WHERE dict_item_name = #{recruit.coach_type}),(SELECT dict_id FROM base_dict WHERE dict_item_name = "#{recruit.coach_style}"),#{recruit.salary_up},#{recruit.salary_down},0)
mapper.update: update venue_coach set cv_status = 2 where coach_id = #{0}
mapper.select: select v.venue_id, v.user_id, v.clicks, v.img1, v.img2, v.img3, v.venue_detail, u.user_phone, u.user_email, u.user_wechat, u.user_qq, u.real_name from venue v left join `user` u on v.user_id = u.user_id where v.venue_id = #{venueId}
mapper.sql: venue_id, user_id, clicks, img1, img2, img3, venue_detail, venue_flag
mapper.insert: insert into venue (venue_id, user_id, clicks, img1, img2, img3, venue_detail, venue_flag) values (#{venueId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{clicks,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{img1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{img2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{img3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{venueDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{venueFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER})

update venue
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
clicks = #{clicks,jdbcType=BIGINT},
img1 = #{img1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
img2 = #{img2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
img3 = #{img3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
venue_detail = #{venueDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
venue_flag = #{venueFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where venue_id = #{venueId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update venue set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, clicks = #{clicks,jdbcType=BIGINT}, img1 = #{img1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img2 = #{img2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img3 = #{img3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, venue_detail = #{venueDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, venue_flag = #{venueFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where venue_id = #{venueId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
